snippet: NASA’s older rover, which landed on the red planet in 2004, has been exploring an intriguing plot of Martian real estate.
abstract: NASA's Mars rover Opportunity, which landed in 2004, has continued to operate years beyond its planned lifetime; rover is now exploring intriguing plot of land showing chemistry that may have been suitable for life.
lead_paragraph: NASA’s older rover, which landed on the red planet in 2004, has been exploring an intriguing plot of Martian real estate.

headline.seo: On Mars, Opportunity Rover Continues to Cover New Ground
headline.main: Opportunity, a Mars Rover Past Its Best-By Date, Keeps Going
headline.print_headline: Opportunity, a Mars Rover Past Its Best-By Date, Keeps Going
